page.title: 05TRANSPORT.
page.content: For 20 minutes in one place 170 different vehicles passed me.There were:133 cars,14 vans,9 comercial vans,6 push bikes,3 lorries and 3 motor bikes,1 bus.This proves that cars are definately a very popular form of transport.Vans are used quite a lot for advertising.Push bikes weren't very common,I only saw 6.Motor bikes and lorries were very scarce but there were a few.Also,I saw an R.A.F bus.Coaches must be busy because I usually see a lot.My position was next to "foto powel" on the High Street from 4:20 to 4:40 p.m.There are 3 main roads going into Ilfracombe but they are not very wide and makes the journey quite slow.People used to travel to Ilfracombe by sea,but now this only happens in the summer.
